entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Port-Cartier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:04 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain mixed with snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain becoming mixed with snow after midnight. Snowfall amount 10 cm over western sections. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
